attributes.action: nationalise gas, electricity and water utilities to bring the price of domestic energy down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apparent Tacit collusion in pricing by the energy companies to keep energy prices artificially high is making the lives of the ordinary British family a misery, we cannot effectively heat our homes in the Winter months and many older people are not only in fuel poverty but are dying and have died of hypothermia.
